highlights: Built computer vision models for medical image classification achieving 0.95 AUC
Designed and deployed MLOps infrastructure using Kubernetes and Kubeflow
Developed a multimodal prognosis prediction system using vision transformers
Applied cross-modal transfer learning for video data analysis and classification
Designed an event detection algorithm using infra-red / depth sensor data
Developed a monocular depth estimation model for edge devices
Developed a geospatial simulation to optimize city-wide emergency response
Identified accident-prone hotspots using geostatistical analysis
